评论详情: I’m 3 months pp and they fit just right. Thin, but i mean theyre priced correctly to know that. They ARE thick enough to wear out, however. no weird bagginess in the front & they’re long enough.

Very comfortable pants, loose fit and nice and snug waist elastic. Fabric is thick enough for great coverage and warmth but not too thick for summer. I’d wear them for any season. The white straps are thick, I just throw them inside untied, tying them makes a bulky knot.

I've been searching everywhere for a suitable replacement to my favorite lightweight sweatpants since Secret Treasures completely changed their material. I work from home and live in lightweight sweats/joggers. These feel exactly the same and are so comfortable. They are great for sitting all day at a computer. Lightweight yet still warm. Great for all seasons. True to size. And decent size pockets!  However, different colors have a different material feel and weight and sizing is inconsistent. I loved the navy blue feel/weight and fit in medium but so far other colors have been very different. More silky, thinner, and run small. I will probably stick to several pair in the navy in both medium and large.

The perfect pair of sweats. Not too heavy, not too light. Have multiple colors. They wash and dry nice, no pilling in the crotch or thigh area.  They stay put at the ankles but are not too tight. I could live in these sweats.

I thought these were genuine sweat pants that were meant to keep you warm. They are very thin and I would consider them lounge pants or pajama pants. So not warm enough for cooler months at home or to go run errands in. But they are comfortable and look nice so I will keep these for warmer months.  Since it says baggy, The sizing is as expected! I am 5’3, 150lbs and a pear shape so I carry more weight in my thighs and hips. I ordered a large and it was nice and loose but not overly baggy. So I’m happy with that at least!

These are so soft, light and wash very well.  They're not the thick fleece sweatpants so I can sleep in them without getting too hot.  No shrinkage or pilling after two washes.  I bought 2 pair and love them for working out, housework and lounging.

I wear a 14-16 in women’s. I am 5 ft 8 and weigh 195. I got the 2xl because I wanted them baggy and I wanted the length to fit. They are just long enough and pushing them up on my leg looks cute. Mi have a little bit of a belly so the 2xl fits my waist very very comfortable!!! I like that they aren’t so thick. They can be worn in fall and summer and spring where I live but winter may require something underneath them like leggings. I really love them. I hope they don’t shrink. They did not have a smell. The color is ok. The red is not a true red. It’s a brushed soft red. They are not are through. The price was good. I may get more.

Like others have said, they are NOT true heavy "sweatpants" material, so do not buy if you are looking for warm sweatpants. They are, however, very soft and comfortable to lounge in, they wash well so far. They do run small, IMO, and I sized up based on others' reviews. I am just under 5'8 at 133lbs and ordered a Large and they fit great. I love the pockets.

I love these joggers they are very soft, comfortable and wash well. I purchased one pair size 2xl loved them, went back to purchase three more in 2xl. I purchased one the same color I had and two in a darker gray. One pair I received was a 2XL the other two was XXL. The fit was not the same. I thought it was me that ordered the wrong size but when I go to my order page both pair comes up XXL. The sizing is obviously not the same, but one color is a 2XL even though there is no 2XL sizing listed. There is a sizing issue on their website that I wish they would fix because I would like more 2XL. They are thin, but not too thin. I needed joggers that even though it’s cold outside its comfortable inside my very hot working conditions.

These are great... warm, but breathable, they're cozy and seem well made like they won't pill up or fall apart after the first washing.  Be aware you're buying elastic cinched bottom/ankle.  I didn't pay attention to that and don't love it but that's my error, and nothing the manufacturer or seller did - so won't affect my 5 star rating.

Update; 10/29 We had several unseasonably cold nights here and I was correct, these are very comfortable for sleeping. The calf's don't ride up like traditional pajamas and the waist doesn't get twisted. They don't feel heavy but they keep your legs warm. They wash well, but they definitely need to be dried on a medium setting or lower, otherwise they'll shrink. I've already purchased several additional colors. I love wearing them around the house, if I'm running to pick up my grocery order or prescriptions  I really like these, they're perfect for wearing at home or just running errands. At first I thought they were going to be way too long, but after washing (cold) and drying (medium) they're great. They're not baggy as described, but not too tight. They do loosen up around the calf. If you're looking for something to keep your warm, these probably aren't what you need. I live in the south and we've had an earlier than usual cool spell and theyre perfect for the weather here. I think they'll be perfect to wear for sleeping in the fall and winter since it's so hard to find pajamas that aren't too long for my height. My favorite color is the blue heather, but I like the others I got and will probably buy additional colors in the future.

The material is great. They are thin but not see through. My only complaint is the waist, it’s a little tight even with the string and doesn’t really go well with the rest of the pant. It’s not unbearable but just something to note. Otherwise super soft and nice.

评论概述: Comfortable but color is not accurate
评论详情: I ordered the color coffee and it’s not the neutral medium brown color I expected, more reddish light brown. They’re very comfortable and color still works for me but I would’ve preferred the coffee color shown in the pictures.

These are great and I'll be buying them again but I would say they are more like Lounge pants than sweatpants. They are not thick at all, very thin, but also very soft and comfotable. any dissapointment i felt at the lack of thickness was made up for by the feel of the fabric.

Purchased a large and I love the fit. If you have thick thighs they will not be baggy, but they are stretchy and comfortable.  Will purchase more. Very happy with my purchase. Can wear them anytime of the year the material isn't thick.

Overall, the pants are super comfy and I love them. They did send me pink, but I ordered dark brown, so that was kind of a bummer. I would give 5 stars if I had been given the right color. Amazon makes it more difficult to make an item right when something is screwed up, so I won't be asking for them to fix it just because of the inconvience that would be placed on me. However, on the plus side, I will probably order another pair because I do like them so much...hopefully they send me the right color this time.
Comfy for lounging! A light weight material that is more suited for the fall outdoor weather, rather than winter temps. Material does not shed.

Absolutely LOVE these!!! The material is silky smooth. I was leary when it suggested buying a larger size than normal, but very happy I did. Most comfortable pants ever! I have ordered another pair in a different color.

UPDATE:  She tried them on finally.  She is 5’5 and about 160 pounds.  Looks like a good fit.I would like to know more about fit hopefully soon. The recipient has been sick. They looked very thin but that is what they wanted.  I like thin myself. More to come…

评论概述: Size up to get fit like photo
评论详情: I’m keeping these, they are perfectly fine lounge pants. But if you want them to be baggy joggers, go at least one size up. I ordered my normal size and they are snug on waist and legs
The only thing I don’t like about these pants is that they’re not very soft. Quality is good though.

Love them.  Lightweight yet not clingy like spandex.  Breathable and just down right Comfy. Bought 2 more  after having the first pair a few weeks and after several washings. (NOT FOR WARMTH OR WINTER USE)
Comfortable and wash well. I have an expensive pair that these stack up to very well.
I just love these sweatpants. I weigh 127 pounds and bought a size medium. They fit great! I ordered 2 more pairs.m
price and quality align. would recommend

评论概述: Just what I was wanting! However….
评论详情: I was looking for a soft seemed, thinner, unbinding around the waist, light weight lounge sweatpants, as my skin is very sensitive to pressures and textures. This is exactly what these are! Being in a warmer climate these are great for spring, fall, summer evenings outside to help ward off the mosquitoes, but they can bite through them! They don’t seem to be attracted to the lighter colors. Perhaps spray the dark colored before going outdoors in the evening. (At least you don’t have bug spray on your skin) These would not be suitable for winter in any climate. I am a more small person and I wanted them baggy so I got the medium, however the medium was a little too snug for me around the waste. (Remember I am sensitive so prolly wouldn’t bother most) So I order a large (in the photo) and they are supper cozy! I would buy again!
I bought a pair to go along with a couple of tee shirts . She liked them so much that I have since bought 3 more pairs in different colors.

These pants are awsome.  I have had the same brand before, actually got for Christmas last year and still loving them.  The color is great, they are soft, wash up looking like new.  Very comfortable.  Totally great.
They’re soft, comfy and warm.  Not like other sweatpants that are heavy and bulky, these are light but warm and very comfortable to wear!  Love them and the pockets are an added bonus!
These sweatpants are true to size, thin material (so not for the dead of winter), and very comfy. I am wearing them over my leggings to and from the gym.

I bought these pants for my 94-year-old mother, to keep her warm during the cool months. I bought others as well, butreturned them. These were a much better quality and she says they are very comfortable l. I’m going to buy her another pair.
Liked the first pair so much, I ordered 2 more
I have 3 pairs of these and will be buying more. They are great quality and fit really well.
Overall these are fine but the waistband is kind of tight.
Simple, soft sweats.

Not baggy unless ordering a size up. I’m typically an M and I like the way the L fits for these. I had 1 pair that I found myself wanting to wear at the end of everyday as my comfy lounge pants. I just ordered 2 more so that definitely ups my odds of having a clean pair. They are perfectly thin which is exactly what I wanted so even under a blanket I’m not too hot. There is no fuzz or lint to shed. I’m a fan! I’m actually considering throwing away my old favorite lounge pants with the holes in the pockets and ragged seams.

评论概述: Comfortable and easy to care for

Thin but comfy. Washes well. Value is great. The waistband is sturdy to keep the pants where u put them. Stretchy & fit well
Great color & quality, I've ordered 2 more

I absolutely love these joggers. They are the thinner pants with no lining in them and I love them all year round. I would really be happier without the strings hanging because the elastic waist is tight enough to hold the pants up. They are a great value for your money.
I love these pants, the fit is perfect and they feel soft and comfortable.

The pants are a little long which i dont mind bc im 5'6 but others might not like that. I ordered a medium which are a little large but they are comfy. I weigh #140. I gave a 4 star out of 5 due to the thin fabric. I wanted thicker, warmer for the michigan winter but they're good for fall and spring. They are like t shirt fabric
waist was too small for a medium
Very comfortable and easy care fabric

Nice sweatpants, saw a review that the waist is a little tight and I agree. I ordered a large and weigh about 150. I can wear them out and about just fine, ordered an XL for more loose, lounging pants.
Wife said material is comfortable.
I’m 5 foot 10 with a 34 inch inseam and these sweats are great if you wanna wear them as capris
It has become my favorite pant. I wear it everywhere and l love it as it's soft and easy to use
super comfortable and breathable. wore these for thanksgiving... had extra room to grow!
Nice waistband, thinner material but not like the cheap material I’ve had before where it’ll breakdown after a couple of washes. Looks great on

I was hesitant at first to buy these i wasn't sure about the material and how'd they fit but I finally ordered them and I'm very pleased with them. I ended up buying 4 pairs. Their very comfortable and soft.

评论详情: Very comfortable. Not bulky but not too thin. Perfect to wear to physical therapy sessions. Wish the light purple wasn’t a higher price or they would be in my collection
Not a five star review, as these do not look brown like the picture. They look like another color of this pant that I bought. Fit and feel grear.

They fit perfectly!  The fabric is very soft and washed great!  They won’t shrink because there’s no cotton — and that’s the only negative.  I wish they would be somewhat a thicker cotton brushed fabric so they’d be warmer for the long winter ahead.

Great quality, super comfortable and cute! These are not heavy duty sweats, fabric is like a super thick tshirt material which I love. They have pockets, elastic waist with a drawstring and elastic at the ankles. I have washed several times and they are holding up.
So so comfy, fit perfect
These pants are very comfortable and fit well.  I would not call them 'sweatpants' because they are thin, but other than that would recommend highly.
Nice weight, not to heavy, not to thin. I have machine washed and line dried several times and still looks and feels like new. Perfect for walking the dogs, running errands or lounging around home.
Comfortable and fit well, washed well with little shrinkage or fading

I'm 5"8 & 110 pounds. These aren't as comfortable as they look in the picture. The material is thin and not as soft as they look in the picture, it depends on what you're looking for in a pair of sweatpants. They are a little too short so when I walk the material rubs against my upper leg. I don't like the way that feels. That being said, I like the way they look, they have pockets, and even though they're thinner and not as soft as I expected, for the price I'd keep them if they were long enough and not uncomfortable on my upper legs with each step.

I love these sweatpants! Very comfortable and flattering. I am 5’5” 180 pounds. I purchased X-large because I like a baggy fit. They are well made with a soft fabric. They are not real thick like some sweats. I have 3 colors.
Lighter weight but still good. I wear these all the time.
Very comfortable and not to long. As I have that problem in a lot of pjs. But I’m 5’3 and it’s perfect and still length for taller ladies

These are soft and so comfy. Not see though at all either. They do fit more like a stretchy jogger, but they’re great for anything! No smell and they’ve washed up very well. Will be ordering more makes at some point

I like these pants very much, except for the waist. They are soft with roomy pockets, and retain the shape after washing/drying. My only complaint is the waist; it is disproportionately small - by a lot! The legs, hips and length are fine, but the waist, having very sturdy elastic (a good thing), is so small that it is extremely uncomfortable. I ordered two pair, one in each dark and light gray; the problem exists with both. I'm in my late 60s, and wore a size XS-S my entire adult life, until about two years ago when I graduated to Medium in some items (depending on brand). That being said, I know a small waistband when I come across one. I don't think ordering these pants in a Large would help, as they would be too big everywhere else, and I suspect the waist would still be very small.
Comfy but my usual size was snug. Had to buy again and size up.
These are so comfortable and fit so well! Not too thick but also not too thin. I bought these to wear after surgery and now I wear them all the time! One of my favorite sweats.

They are snug , I ordered a size bigger than I usually wear im usually a medium and I ordered large and they are snug and the waist is tight without tying strings . They are soft and I'm sure they'll loosen with wear but definitely order a size bigger .
fit her very good
Perfect for lounging around the house! I absolutely love them! They are warm and were a great price!
First pair I got fit great, second pair (same size), too small. Sizes are not consistent. Otherwise I love the fabric and well made.
Nice color and fit well.  Purchased large for 5’4 165 lbs.
Great value for the money, the fabrick is soft and warm. I would buy another pair in a different color. Love them.
The pants are okay, but I expected thicker fabric. It’s not sweatshirt material.

These are so comfy! I'm short. 5'1". These are a little bit long. But since they have gathered cuffs, it works out. I wear them around the house and out and about. They wash up nicely, not shrinking. Light weight, not too thin. A good value if your looking for light weight soft comfortable sweat pants.

All the stitches/thread are way darker than the material. But the quality of the product is good. Fit is accurate.

Pants are true to size and extremely comfortable.  Very happy…
Soft, super comfy. Warm, lots of stretch. Nice thickness not too thick. Aren't extremely baggy just right.

I got my first pair on sale for $13. I came back to buy more because they were so cheap, but They’ve gone up in price since, some by $10, and the higher price just isn’t worth it. They pilled after one wear/wash. I do really like the style, but they need to lower the price for the quality. They also collect every tiny hair. If the price goes down, I’ll buy more!
Nice and soft
The xxl size is perfect, good lounge pants for work and under pants for real pants.
Love these pants. Although they are lightweight sweat pants, they are easily dressed up with an upscale sweater. I might order another pair.
Great quality, super comfortable. Sizing is correct. I will order again
I like everything about these light sweat-type pants. Perfect thickness and soft fabric. Just buy a size up. I’m 5’2 and 124 pounds, and the large fits well.
Good quality sweatpants, and very comfortable to wear. Great price.
It is really comfortable for my new baggy pajamas !..

I live in sweatpants, not afraid to admit it. These are perfect. Soft and comfortable. Drawstring, nice deep pockets, elastic around the ankles but not too tight and annoying. The fabric is great quality and they are nice and warm but breathable.
I got these for my now past surgery and they are super comfy. Lightweight but still good fabric.
Exactly what I ordered
They fit great and I love that they are not to thin but they are not fleece either so can wear them in spring and fall

Sweatpants are warm to wear in winter, these are not.  Sweatpants have a fleece-like inner surface, these do not.  If you're looking for warm pants, these are not them.These are thin, but fairly soft to the touch.  I wanted winter pants, so I considered returning them, but since they're soft, I'll keep them for summer and keep looking for warm pants.
